channel.title: How a proper server should work
channel.description:
I was talking with MrWicked and tought about an idea. Yep :P. I was wondering how I could make the server lagless and able to have more then 30-50 user online without constantly laggin.
[img]http://images.xnr.be/4c4ca1195feba2d4ebf552c4c40d5ace.png[/img]
I hope I made sence:O. Discuss?

item.title: How a proper server should work
item.dc:creator: @Da_Str_Pk4 Da Str Pk4
item.description:
@Da_Str_Pk4 wrote:

Read the image? currently the server has 1 thread to process Player Npc Shop etc etc. My idea is to split the process by area.

Read full topic
